main event: A flashing light was observed in the sky over Bedford, Massachusetts at 10:25 P.M. on August 6, 1961.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a reddish glow and was approximately 50 feet in diameter., The object descended to about 5000 feet altitude and then rapidly flew away., No sound was heard during the observation., The observation lasted for about 5 minutes., The weather conditions were clear with a full moon.
sighted object: flashing light with a reddish glow
witness description: The observer provided an estimated size for the object and noted its altitude and behavior.
